mainBoard.name: Tivash, Gloom Summoner
mainBoard.originalText:
Lifelink
At the beginning of your end step, if you gained life this turn, you may pay X life, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn. If you do, create an X/X black Demon creature token with flying.

rulings.text: Tivash’s ability counts the total amount of life gained without considering any life you lost during that turn. For example, if you lost 3 life and gained 4 life earlier in the turn, you may pay 4 life to create a 4/4 Demon.
You can’t pay less life than the amount of life you gained to create a smaller but less harmful Demon.
You need to gain life before the end step begins for the last ability to trigger.

mainBoard.text:

mainBoard.name: Oathsworn Vampire
mainBoard.originalText:
Oathsworn Vampire enters the battlefield tapped.
You may cast Oathsworn Vampire from your graveyard if you gained life this turn.

rulings.text: Casting Oathsworn Vampire from your graveyard follows the normal rules for casting that card. You must pay its costs, and you must follow all applicable timing rules.

Oathsworn Vampire's last ability cares only whether you gained life in the turn, even if Oathsworn Vampire wasn't in your graveyard when that happened. It doesn't care how much you gained, whether you also lost life, or even whether you lost more life than you gained.

mainBoard.name: Bloodbond Vampire
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodbond Vampire.

rulings.text: A creature with lifelink dealing combat damage is a single life-gaining event. For example, if two creatures you control with lifelink deal combat damage at the same time, the ability will trigger twice. However, if a single creature with lifelink deals combat damage to multiple creatures, players, and/or planeswalkers at the same time (perhaps because it has trample or was blocked by more than one creature), the ability will trigger only once.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, life gained by your teammate won’t cause the ability to trigger, even though it causes your team’s life total to increase.
The ability triggers just once for each life-gaining event, whether it’s 1 life from Drana’s Emissary or 7 life from Nissa’s Renewal.

mainBoard.name: Marauding Blight-Priest
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.

rulings.text: An ability that triggers “whenever you gain life” triggers just once for each life-gaining event, no matter how much life you gain.

Each creature with lifelink dealing combat damage causes a separate life-gaining event. For example, if two creatures you control with lifelink deal combat damage at the same time, a “whenever you gain life” ability will trigger twice. However, if a single creature you control with lifelink deals combat damage to multiple creatures, players, and/or planeswalkers at the same time (perhaps because it has trample or was blocked by more than one creature), the ability will trigger only once.
If you gain an amount of life “for each” of something, that life is gained as one event and the ability will trigger only once.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, Marauding Blight-Priest’s ability causes the opposing team to lose 2 life.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, life gained by your teammate won’t cause the ability to trigger, even though it caused your team’s life total to increase.

mainBoard.text: Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.

foreignData.text: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält -2/-2 bis zum Ende des Zuges. Du erhältst 2 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreignData.flavorText: "Llegó el momento de la condenación. ¡El Crepúsculo invade el mundo y yo te sentencio a la oscuridad eterna!".
foreignData.name: Momento de antojo
foreignData.text: La criatura objetivo obtiene -2/-2 hasta el final del turno. Ganas 2 vidas.

foreignData.flavorText: « L'heure de la condamnation est proche. Le crépuscule s'étend sur le monde, et je vous relègue dans les ténèbres éternelles ! »
foreignData.name: Instant d'envie
foreignData.text: Une créature ciblée gagne -2/-2 jusqu'à la fin du tour. Vous gagnez 2 points de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: "Il tempo del castigo è prossimo. Il Vespro pervaderà il mondo e sarete condannati all'oscurità eterna!"
foreignData.name: Momento di Bramosia
foreignData.text: Una creatura bersaglio prende -2/-2 fino alla fine del turno. Guadagni 2 punti vita.

foreignData.flavorText: 「糾弾の時は目前。薄暮が世界を浄化する。お前は永遠の闇に落ちるがいい。」
foreignData.name: 渇望の時
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは－２/－２の修整を受ける。あなたは２点のライフを得る。

foreignData.flavorText: 「惩戒之时就在眼前。暮影盖世，赐汝永眠！」
foreignData.name: 渴血之时
foreignData.text: 选择目标生物。该生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。你获得2点生命。

mainBoard.name: Moment of Craving
mainBoard.originalText: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

rulings.text: If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Moment of Craving tries to resolve, the spell doesn’t resolve. You won’t gain 2 life.

The target creature will still be on the battlefield when you gain life, even if its toughness has been reduced to 0 or less. Any abilities it has that interact with gaining life do so as appropriate. If any abilities trigger on you gaining life, the creature will be put into its owner’s graveyard after that ability triggers but before it resolves.

mainBoard.text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

foreignData.flavorText: Wissen verlangt Opfer.
foreignData.name: Uraltes Verlangen
foreignData.text: Du ziehst drei Karten und verlierst 3 Lebenspunkte.

foreignData.flavorText: El conocimiento exige sacrificio.
foreignData.name: Anhelo antiguo
foreignData.text: Robas tres cartas y pierdes 3 vidas.

foreignData.flavorText: Le savoir exige un sacrifice.
foreignData.name: Passion pour l'antique
foreignData.text: Vous piochez trois cartes et vous perdez 3 points de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: La conoscenza richiede sacrifici.
foreignData.name: Desiderio Atavico
foreignData.text: Peschi tre carte e perdi 3 punti vita.

foreignData.flavorText: 知識は犠牲を求める。
foreignData.name: 古えの渇望
foreignData.text: あなたはカード３枚を引き、３点のライフを失う。

foreignData.flavorText: 要牺牲才能获取知识。
foreignData.name: 远古渴望
foreignData.text: 你抓三张牌且失去3点生命。

mainBoard.name: Ancient Craving
mainBoard.originalText: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
mainBoard.text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

mainBoard.flavorText: Some spirits cling to one person, feasting on the growing fear until a final moment of all-consuming terror.

foreignData.flavorText: Einige Geister heften sich an eine Person und schwelgen in ihrer wachsenden Angst, bis zu einem finalen Moment alles verschlingender Panik.
foreignData.name: Sicherer Tod
foreignData.text: Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl. Ihr Beherrscher verliert 2 Lebenspunkte und du erhältst 2 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreignData.flavorText: Algunos espíritus se aferran a alguien y se alimentan del creciente miedo hasta el último momento, en el que el terror lo consume todo.
foreignData.name: Muerte segura
foreignData.text: Destruye la criatura objetivo. Su controlador pierde 2 vidas y tú ganas 2 vidas.

foreignData.flavorText: Certains esprits s'accrochent à une personne, savourant sa peur grandissante jusqu'à ce qu'enfin la terreur la consume.
foreignData.name: Une mort certaine
foreignData.text: Détruisez une créature ciblée. Son contrôleur perd 2 points de vie et vous gagnez 2 points de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: Alcuni spiriti si aggrappano a una persona, banchettando con il suo crescente timore fino a un ultimo istante di terrore divorante.
foreignData.name: Morte Certa
foreignData.text: Distruggi una creatura bersaglio. Il suo controllore perde 2 punti vita e tu guadagni 2 punti vita.

foreignData.flavorText: 霊の中には一人のみに付きまとうものもいる。恐れが大きくなるのを見て楽しみ、最後の瞬間に恐怖を味わい尽くすのだ。
foreignData.name: 生命の危機
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それを破壊する。それのコントローラーは２点のライフを失い、あなたは２点のライフを得る。

foreignData.flavorText: 有些鬼魂会紧缠一人，以其日渐增长的恐惧为食，直到吞噬一切的终极恐怖来临。
foreignData.name: 必死无疑
foreignData.text: 消灭目标生物。其操控者失去2点生命且你获得2点生命。

mainBoard.name: Certain Death
mainBoard.originalText: Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

rulings.text: If the creature becomes an illegal target for Certain Death, no player gains or loses life. If it’s a legal target but isn’t destroyed, most likely due to having indestructible, its controller still loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
The targeted creature will have already left the battlefield before its controller loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. If it has any abilities that care about gaining or losing life, they won’t apply.

mainBoard.text: Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

mainBoard.flavorText: "The suffering of others is not my concern."

foreignData.flavorText: „Das Leiden der anderen interessiert mich nicht."
foreignData.name: Unrechtmäßiges Erbe
foreignData.text:
Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments fügt das Unrechtmäßige Erbe jedem Gegner 1 Schadenspunkt zu und du erhältst 1 Lebenspunkt dazu.
{5}{B}, opfere das Unrechtmäßige Erbe: Es fügt einem Gegner deiner Wahl 4 Schadenspunkte zu und du erhältst 4 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreignData.flavorText: "El sufrimiento de otros no es asunto mío".
foreignData.name: Herencia ilícita
foreignData.text:
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, la Herencia ilícita hace 1 punto de daño a cada oponente y tú ganas 1 vida.
{5}{B}, sacrificar la Herencia ilícita: Hace 4 puntos de daño al oponente objetivo y tú ganas 4 vidas.

foreignData.flavorText: « Je n'ai que faire de la souffrance des autres. »
foreignData.name: Héritage mal acquis
foreignData.text:
Au début de votre entretien, l'Héritage mal acquis inflige 1 blessure à chaque adversaire et vous gagnez 1 point de vie.
{5}{B}, sacrifiez l'Héritage mal acquis : Il inflige 4 blessures à un adversaire ciblé et vous gagnez 4 points de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: "La sofferenza altrui non è un mio problema."
foreignData.name: Eredità Illecita
foreignData.text:
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, l'Eredità Illecita infligge 1 danno a ogni avversario e tu guadagni 1 punto vita.
{5}{B}, Sacrifica l'Eredità Illecita: Infligge 4 danni a un avversario bersaglio e tu guadagni 4 punti vita.

foreignData.flavorText: 「他人の苦しみなど私には関係ない。」
foreignData.name: 不正相続
foreignData.text:
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、不正相続は各対戦相手にそれぞれ１点のダメージを与え、あなたは１点のライフを得る。
{5}{B},不正相続を生け贄に捧げる：対戦相手１人を対象とする。不正相続はそのプレイヤーに４点のダメージを与え、あなたは４点のライフを得る。

foreignData.flavorText: 「别人是否受罪与我无关。」
foreignData.name: 不当遗产
foreignData.text:
在你的维持开始时，不当遗产向每位对手各造成1点伤害且你获得1点生命。
{5}{B}，牺牲不当遗产：它向目标对手造成4点伤害且你获得4点生命。

mainBoard.name: Ill-Gotten Inheritance
mainBoard.originalText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, Ill-Gotten Inheritance deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.
{5}{B}, Sacrifice Ill-Gotten Inheritance: It deals 4 damage to target opponent and you gain 4 life.

rulings.text: In a Two-Headed Giant game, Ill-Gotten Inheritance’s first ability causes the opposing team to lose 2 life and you gain 1 life.

mainBoard.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, Ill-Gotten Inheritance deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.
{5}{B}, Sacrifice Ill-Gotten Inheritance: It deals 4 damage to target opponent and you gain 4 life.

mainBoard.flavorText: Beauty appears in strange places for those with eyes to see it.

foreignData.flavorText: Schönheit zeigt sich denen, die sie erkennen können, an merkwürdigen Orten.
foreignData.name: Gedeihendes Moor
foreignData.text:
Das Gedeihende Moor kommt getappt ins Spiel.
Sowie das Gedeihende Moor ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Schwarz.
{T}: Erzeuge {B} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: Los que ven la belleza son capaces de vislumbrarla en lugares extraños.
foreignData.name: Páramo floreciente
foreignData.text:
El Páramo floreciente entra al campo de batalla girado.
En cuanto el Páramo floreciente entre al campo de batalla, elige un color que no sea negro.
{T}: Agrega {B} o un maná del color elegido.

foreignData.flavorText: La beauté perle dans des endroits étranges pour ceux qui peuvent la voir.
foreignData.name: Lande prospère
foreignData.text:
La Lande prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.
Au moment où la Lande prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez une couleur autre que le noir.
{T} : Ajoutez {B} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: La bellezza si manifesta in luoghi insoliti per chi ha occhi per vederla.
foreignData.name: Landa Florida
foreignData.text:
La Landa Florida entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.
Mentre la Landa Florida entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli un colore diverso dal nero.
{T}: Aggiungi {B} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 奇妙な場所にも美は存在し、見る目を持つものを楽しませる。
foreignData.name: 興隆する湿地帯
foreignData.text:
興隆する湿地帯はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
興隆する湿地帯が戦場に出るに際し、黒でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{B}か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: 此地美景尽藏奇异之处，唯眼光独到者方能得见。
foreignData.name: 兴旺湿地
foreignData.text:
兴旺湿地须横置进战场。
于兴旺湿地进战场时，选择一种黑色以外的颜色。
{T}：加{B}或一点所选颜色的法术力。

mainBoard.name: Thriving Moor
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Moor enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Moor enters the battlefield, choose a color other than black.
{T}: Add {B} or one mana of the chosen color.
mainBoard.text:
Thriving Moor enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than black.
{T}: Add {B} or one mana of the chosen color.
